The configuration to use for the translation, if required.

member.name: T:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Extensions.PublicExpressionExtensions
member.summary: Provides a set of static extension methods for Expression information.

member.name: M:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Extensions.PublicExpressionExtensions.GetSubject(Microsoft.Scripting.Ast.MethodCallExpression)
member.summary: Returns the Expression representing the subject of the given .
member.param: The Expression representing the method call the subject of which should be retrieved.
member.returns: The Expression representing the subject of the given .

member.name: M:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Extensions.PublicExpressionExtensions.GetParentOrNull(Microsoft.Scripting.Ast.Expression)
member.summary: Gets the parent Expression for the given .
member.param: The Expression for which to retrieve the parent.
member.returns: The given 's parent Expression.

member.name: T:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Extensions.PublicTypeExtensions
member.summary: Provides a set of static extension methods for type information.

member.name: M:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Extensions.PublicTypeExtensions.GetFriendlyName(System.Type,System.Func{AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.TranslationSettings,AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.TranslationSettings})
member.summary: Returns a friendly, readable version of the name of the given .
member.param: The type for which to retrieve a friendly, readable name.
The configuration to use for the variable naming, if required.
member.returns: A friendly, readable version of the name of the given .

member.name: M:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Extensions.PublicTypeExtensions.GetVariableNameInCamelCase(System.Type,System.Func{AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.TranslationSettings,AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.TranslationSettings})
member.summary: Retrieves a camel-case variable name for a variable of this .
member.param: The Type for which to retrieve the variable name.
The configuration to use for the variable naming, if required.
member.returns: A camel-case variable name for a variable of this .

member.name: M:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Extensions.PublicTypeExtensions.GetVariableNameInPascalCase(System.Type,System.Func{AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.TranslationSettings,AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.TranslationSettings})
member.summary: Retrieves a pascal-case variable name for a variable of this .
member.param: The Type for which to retrieve the variable name.
The configuration to use for the variable naming, if required.
member.returns: A pascal-case variable name for a variable of this .

member.name: M:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Extensions.PublicTypeExtensions.IsEnumerable(System.Type)
member.summary: Determines if this is an enumerable Type.
member.param: The Type for which to make the determination.
member.returns: True if this is an enumerable Type, otherwise false.

member.name: M:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Extensions.PublicTypeExtensions.IsDictionary(System.Type)
member.summary: Determines if this is a Dictionary Type.
member.param: The Type for which to make the determination.
member.returns: True if this is a Dictionary Type, otherwise false.

member.name: M:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Extensions.PublicTypeExtensions.GetDictionaryTypes(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets a KeyValuePair containing the key and value Types of this Dictionary .
member.param: The Type for which to retrieve the key and value Types.
member.returns: A KeyValuePair containing the key and value Types of this Dictionary .

member.name: M:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Extensions.PublicTypeExtensions.GetDictionaryType(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets the Dictionary Type of this - either the Dictionary Type it is, or the first IDictionary Type it implements. If this is not a Dictionary Type, returns null.
member.param: The Type for which to retrieve the Dictionary Type.
member.returns: The Dictionary Type of this , or null if there is none.

member.name: M:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Extensions.PublicTypeExtensions.GetEnumerableElementType(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets the element Type for this .
member.param: The enumerable Type for which to retrieve the element Type.
member.returns: The element Type for this , or null if this Type is not enumerable.

member.name: M:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Extensions.PublicTypeExtensions.CanBeNull(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the given can be null.
member.param: The type for which to make the determination.
member.returns: True if the given can be null, otherwise false.

member.name: M:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Extensions.PublicTypeExtensions.IsNullableType(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the given is a Nullable{T}.
member.param: The type for which to make the determination.
member.returns: True if the given is a Nullable{T}, otherwise false.

member.name: M:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Extensions.PublicTypeExtensions.GetNonNullableType(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets the underlying non-nullable Type of this , or returns this if it is not nullable.
member.param: The Type for which to retrieve the underlying non-nullable Type.
member.returns: The underlying non-nullable Type of this , or returns this if it is not nullable.

member.name: T:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.ReadableExpression
member.summary: A factory class providing the Comment Expression

member.summary: Create a representing a code comment with the given .

member.returns: A representing a code comment.

member.name: T:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.TranslationSettings
member.summary: Provides configuration options to control aspects of source-code string generation.

member.name: P:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.TranslationSettings.UseFullyQualifiedTypeNames
member.summary: Fully qualify Type names with their namespace.

member.name: P:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.TranslationSettings.UseExplicitGenericParameters
member.summary: Always specify generic parameter arguments explicitly in <pointy braces>

member.name: P:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.TranslationSettings.ShowQuotedLambdaComments
member.summary: Annotate a Quoted Lambda Expression with a comment indicating that it has been Quoted.

member.name: M:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.TranslationSettings.NameAnonymousTypesUsing(System.Func{System.Type,System.String})
member.summary: Name anonymous types using the given instead of the default method.
member.param: The factory method to execute to retrieve the name for an anonymous type.

member.name: M:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.TranslationSettings.TranslateConstantsUsing(System.Func{System.Type,System.Object,System.String})
member.summary: Translate ConstantExpressions using the given instead of the default method.
member.param: The factory method to execute to retrieve the ConstantExpression's translated value.

member.name: P:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Translations.Interfaces.ITranslationContext.Settings
member.summary: Configuration for translation in this context

member.name: P:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Translations.Interfaces.ITranslationContext.JoinedAssignmentVariables
member.summary: Gets the variables in the translated which should be declared in the same statement in which they are assigned.

member.name: M:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Translations.Interfaces.ITranslationContext.IsNotJoinedAssignment(Microsoft.Scripting.Ast.Expression)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the given represents an assignment where the assigned variable is declared as part of the assignment statement.
member.param: The to evaluate.
member.returns: True if the given represents an assignment where the assigned variable is declared as part of the assignment statement, otherwise false.

member.name: M:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Translations.Interfaces.ITranslationContext.IsCatchBlockVariable(Microsoft.Scripting.Ast.Expression)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the given is the Exception variable in a Catch block.
member.param: The expression for which to make the determination.
member.returns: True if the given is the Exception variable in a Catch block, otherwise false.

member.name: M:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Translations.Interfaces.ITranslationContext.IsReferencedByGoto(Microsoft.Scripting.Ast.LabelTarget)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the given is referenced by a .
member.param: The to evaluate.
member.returns: True if the given is referenced by a , otherwise false.

member.name: M:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Translations.Interfaces.ITranslationContext.GoesToReturnLabel(Microsoft.Scripting.Ast.GotoExpression)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the given goes to the final statement in a block, and so should be rendered as a return statement.
member.param: The GotoExpression for which to make the determination.
member.returns: True if the given goes to the final statement in a block, otherwise false.

member.name: M:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Translations.Interfaces.ITranslationContext.IsPartOfMethodCallChain(Microsoft.Scripting.Ast.MethodCallExpression)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the given is part of a chain of multiple method calls.
member.param: The to evaluate.
member.returns: True if the given is part of a chain of multiple method calls, otherwise false.

member.name: M:AgileObjects.ReadableExpressions.Translations.Interfaces.ITranslationContext.GetUnnamedVariableNumberOrNull(Microsoft.Scripting.Ast.ParameterExpression)
member.summary: Gets the 1-based index of the given in the set of unnamed, accessed variables of its Type.
member.param: The variable for which to get the 1-based index.
member.returns: The 1-based index of the given , or null if only variable of this Type is declared.

member.returns: The given converted into a DynamicLanguageRuntime Expression.
